name: Marvel Nights Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the real name of the member of the Uncanny X-Men known as Nightcrawler?
questions.explanation:
Kurt Wagner.

	Nightcrawler has amazing acrobatic skills and also has the power to teleport short distances. Scott Summers is better known as Cyclops, Peter Rasputin is Colossus, and Sean Cassidy is Banshee.

questions.text: Marc Spector became the hero Moon Knight after being resurrected by an Egyptian moon god. What was the god's name?
questions.explanation:
Khonshu.

	Moon Knight's real name is Marc Spector, but he has also gone by several other aliases, including Jake Lockley and Steven Grant. Over the years, Moon Knight has had affiliations with The Avengers, The Defenders and the Heroes for Hire. Khonshu is the Egyptian god of the Moon, and his name means "traveller".

questions.text: Night Thrasher founded and led which team of young superheroes?
questions.explanation:
The New Warriors.

	Night Thrasher's real name is Dwayne Taylor. While having no super-powers of his own, he has excellent fighting skills and is trained in martial arts. The New Warriors made their first appearance in the pages of The Mighty Thor. Their original line up was Night Thrasher, Nova, Justice, Firestar, Nova and Namorita.

questions.text: How many issues of the Marvel's New Universe title "Nightmask" were released?
questions.explanation:
Twelve.

	Nightmask's real name is Keith Remsen, and he has the power to enter people's dreams telepathically. The series "Nightmask" was part of Marvel Comics creation of The New Universe, to celebrate their 25th Anniversary. Other titles included "The Star Brand", "D.P.7", "Kickers Inc" and "Spitfire and the Troubleshooters".

questions.text: Four men have taken on the mantle of The Black Knight, but which of them has been a long-serving member of The Avengers?
questions.explanation:
Dane Whitman.

	Dane Whitman, the third Black Knight, had long spells with the Avengers in the late 1980s and early 1990s. Sir Percy of Scandia was the first Black Knight, and one of Dane Whitman's ancestors. Nathan Garrett was the second Black Knight, and Dane Whitman's uncle. The fourth Black Knight, Augustine du Lac was a super-villain of no relation to the other three.

questions.text: Phil Urich, alias the Goblin Knight, has a relative Ben Urich, who has been a veteran reporter on The Daily Bugle for years. How are they related?
questions.explanation:
They are uncle and nephew.

	Phil Urich, Ben's nephew, first came to prominence in the Marvel Universe, when he became the fourth man to take on the mantle of The Green Goblin. Unlike the first three Goblins though, he initially used his powers for good. This did not last however, and after a spell as the supervillain Hobgoblin, he became The Goblin Knight.

questions.text: The supernatural being Nightmare was created by which writer-artist team?
questions.explanation:
Stan Lee and Steve Ditko.

	Nightmare first appeared in the pages of "Strange Tales", where he came up against Doctor Strange.  In addition to Nightmare, Stan Lee and Steve Ditko are well known for creating Spider-Man and Doctor Strange.

questions.text: Misty Knight formed a crime-fighting duo called The Daughters of the Dragon with which Marvel character?
questions.explanation:
Colleen Wing.

	Misty Knight lost her right arm because of a bomb, and now has an artificial one. Daniel Rand (a.k.a. Iron Fist) and Luke Cage (a.k.a. Power Man) are good friends with Colleen and Misty and they have all worked together many times. Jean Grey (Marvel Girl) was room-mates with Misty for a time.

questions.text: Kyle Redmond, a.k.a. Nighthawk was a long-time member of the Defenders, but which supervillain team was he previously with?
questions.explanation:
The Squadron Sinister.

	Nighthawk was originally a member of super-villain group The Squadron Sinister. After being defeated by The Avengers, he reformed and joined The Defenders.

questions.text: Nightside is a member of the alien Shi'ar Imperial Guard. Which mutant title did she first appear in?
questions.explanation:
Uncanny X-Men.

	Nightside has the power to create darkness, which she gets from a dark dimension.
